attributes.review: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS HORRIBLE APP!! It took me 4 HOURS to download! Mind you, it took up all my storage that i had remaining. (17 GB) I was also stuck on the loading screen for 20 minutes. I just wanted to know more about the orange- *cough cough* i meant my president. I will not recommend this app for anyone because it teaches people to be racist and disrespect women. After i signed up, it said horrible things about women and said that black people are (the n word with hard r). DONT DOWNLOAD IT!
attributes.title: Dont download! I had a horrible time!

attributes.review: It is absolutely terrible. I do recommend this app at ALL, it takes to long to sign in, and it was made by a rapist that said and I quote “if she wasn’t my daughter we would be dating”. WHAT KIND OF HORRIBLE FATHER SAYS THAT. Oh that’s right TRUMP WOULD. And the fact that he is more focused on shutting tiktok down then the world is ending like have you not notice 2020 MY DUDE FIX THIS 2020 AND IGNORE THIS tiktok. I recommend never getting this app it will waste your time just like the president does to our lives.
attributes.title: I’ve never been so annoyed 🧚✨

attributes.review: The app is terrible everytime I open it  ,I see this weird orange creature , it doesn’t do anything but just play golf and it seems to be a white supremacists , which is weird since it’s orange , idk it’s trying to run for president in 2020 agian ,and I say that’s kinda dumb who wants a rotten orange thing to run our country , but anyways this app is useless, no one wants to hear about it , it just keeps messing up my screen and I think it has put a virus into my parents heads 🤷🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: This is horrible

attributes.review: The music that starts playing does indeed summon cockroaches. Contrary to my prior belief that Trump doesn’t attract cockroaches I have clearly been proven wrong. I read a review that warned the appearance of cockroaches and I refused to believe it, however upon downloading the app I discovered it to be true. I encourage everyone who experiences this to leave a review so that Apple can become aware of this problem and resolve the issue. Perhaps taking the app down would be the fastest solution. Thanks Apple in advance!
attributes.title: Cockroaches

attributes.review: Take this man out of office now. Why did people vote for this racist Cheeto to begin with? His version of a good America was an America ran by white cis straight Christian males. Oh and not to mention he’s transphobic, homophobic, a r@pist with 10+ allegations, and more. All of his trumpets are brainwashed and I hope they get better soon 💋. P.S don’t take TikTok down Cheeto man. If you do GEN Z is gonna come after you because you know we don’t mess around. Anyways luv, can’t wait to see your face when you’re voted out, bye! 😂👋
attributes.title: TAKE THIS MAN OUT OF OFFICE

attributes.review: This app is terrible as soon as I downloaded it I started to have bad things upon me. It was to the point where I went into the kitchen and someone had drank all the caprisuns😭 Another thing that would happen because of this app is my room started to get dirty after a while. The worst thing yet I went into the bathroom to see my dog levitating then dropped to the floor when he saw me 👀 I had to delete this app afterwards and everything went back to normal.
attributes.title: Cursed App

attributes.review: this app took 3 weeks to download and then when i got in there FINALLY i found a message that said a package was just delivered to my home (i never submitted my address) when i went outside i found extremely large navy blue suit pants that looked eerily familiar and i was like wow how cool and then upon further examination i realized that the pants were filled with poo. the president left his pants that he shidded and farted in on my doorstep. too bad, i probably would’ve voted for him if it wasn’t for this.
attributes.title: poo pants

attributes.review: I download this app to see the news and everything after two days of having it my phone started glitching very badly it said a virus was detected on my phone I had to go get it fixed they told me it was leaking from that software do not download this app if you do not wanna have a virus on your phone also my brother downloaded it in the same happened to him but we deleted it before it could set a virus do not download
attributes.title: Don’t download this app

attributes.review: WHERE DO I EVEN BEGIN?!?! This all is terrible. Not only did it take several hours to download, IT IS SO GLITCHY. It deleted half of my apps I have on my phone, minutes after opening the app, including all the games I play, so I lost all my data. My phone could barely function, after I got it, and glitches every time I open my phone, or try to access an app. Only after I deleted it, things got back to normal. Never doing this again. 0/10
attributes.title: Terrible
